properties.address: Chapel (Priest Room) at St Peter's Church, Lamerton, Devon PL19 8RW
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 12th January 2024** A warm space for anyone who is looking for a space to be warm and enjoy some company. We serve the villages of Lamerton, Milton Abbot, Chillaton, Marystowe, Coryton and Sydenham Damerel, but welcome anybody from the surrounding area. Open fortnightly from 12th January. (On the alternate weeks, there is a Saturday coffee morning in the Lamerton Community Hall.)
properties.title: Coffee & Company

properties.description: A friendly warm cafe space is open during the Food Hub every Wednesday from 11.30 12.30.
properties.title: Kings

properties.description: A cafe run by volunteers from local churches and local community, for everyone to enjoy freshly cooked food at affordable prices. Only open on Fridays from 10am until 2pm, last orders 1.30pm.
properties.title: Lower Deck Cafe

properties.description: Tavistock Food Hub offers a warm and welcoming space with free hot and cold drinks and snacks plus a delicious homemade soup or vegetarian hot meal (we ask for a small donation towards the cost of food but that is optional)
properties.title: Tavistock Food Hub (Weds)

properties.description: Open from 17-10-2022. We aim to offer a Warm Welcome that is inclusive and friendly
properties.title: Tavistock Parish Church

properties.address: Parish Rooms St Eustachius, Tavistock, Devon PL 19 8AU
properties.description: All welcome. Opens at 10.00 -14.00hrs. Homemade soup, baguettes, cheese, cakes/biscuits and plenty of coffee and tea. Chat, read the paper, puzzles or just feel welcomed in a warm space. Free!
properties.title: Warm Welcome

properties.address: Bedford Square, Tavistock, PL19 0AD, United Kingdom
properties.description: The Abbey Chapel in Tavistock are opening their doors to offer a safe and warm space for members of the local community. Abbey Chapel will be opening its doors on Saturdays from 10.30am - 12.30pm. Refreshments available. Services: Free food and drinks available; Device charging; People to talk to; Wheelchair accessible; Toilets; Accessible toilet
properties.title: Abbey Chapel

properties.description: A group of five Churches in Tavistock offering a warm space each day of the week at various venues.
properties.title: Tavistock Area Christians Together (TACT)

properties.address: The King's, Pixon Lane, Tavistock, PL19 9AZ, United Kingdom
properties.description: A food hub operating our of King's church in Tavistock. Anyone coming along can pick up a bagful of food that would otherwise go to waste for £5. They have a small café offering free hot drinks and Danish pastries. They also offer an affordable food club where they deliver larger food boxes to the Tavistock area for £15 a box. Services: Free hot drinks and pastries; Device charging; People to talk to; Affordable food boxes
properties.title: Tavistock Food Hub
